0.1.0.en:
Added configuration for alarm timeout ([#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16)).
Fixed multipart message handling for line crossing/field detection, etc ([#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18)).
Optionally save XML/images & send events using `sendTo` to other adapters ([#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/26)).
Added info.connection state ([#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22)).
Handle cases where `TargetRect` is specified in decimals between zero & one ([#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24)).
0.1.0.de:
Konfiguration für Alarm Timeout [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapter/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Behobene mehrteilige Nachrichtenübermittlung für Linienübermittlung/Felderkennung usw. [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapter/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Optional speichern Sie XML/Bilder & senden Sie Ereignisse mit sendTo an andere Adapter [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/2).
Hinzugefügt Info.connection state [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Handle-Fälle, in denen TargetRect in Dezimals zwischen null und einem [#24] angegeben ist(https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapter/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.ru:
Добавлена конфигурация для аварийного таймаут [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Исправлена обработка мультипарт-сообщений для пересечения строк / обнаружения полей и т.д. [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Дополнительно сохранить XML/изображения и отправлять мероприятия с помощью sendTo в другие адаптеры [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/26).
Добавлено info.connection state [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Обрабатывайте кейсы, где TargetRect указан в десятичных показателях между нулем и одним [#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.pt:
Configuração adicional para tempo limite de alarme [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Manuseamento de mensagens multipart fixo para detecção de cruzamento de linha/campo, etc [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Opcionalmente salvar XML/images & enviar eventos usando sendTo para outros adaptadores [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikserveralar.
Adicionado info.connection state [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Lidar com casos em que o TargetRect é especificado em decimais entre zero e um [#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.nl:
Geconfigureerde configuratie voor alarm tijdverlamming / iBroker.
Vertaling:.
Quality over Quantity (QoQ) Releases Vertaling:.
Gevoegd info-connectie staat 38.00 uur 's nachts.
Handel zaken waar TargetRect wordt gespecificeerd in decimals tussen Zero 01:24, /iobroker-commity-apters/Brovisalvission.
0.1.0.fr:
Ajout d ' une configuration pour le timeout [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Gestion des messages multiparties fixes pour la détection des passages à niveau/champs, etc. [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Enregistrer en option XML/images " envoyer des événements en utilisant sendTo à d ' autres adaptateurs [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) " [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/26).
Informations complémentaires.connection state [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Cas où TargetRect est spécifié dans les décimales entre zéro et un [#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.it:
Configurazione aggiuntiva per il timeout di allarme [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Gestione del messaggio multiparte fissa per l'attraversamento della linea / rilevamento del campo, ecc [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Facoltativamente salvare XML/images & inviare eventi utilizzando sendTo ad altri adattatori [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmer).
Aggiunto info.connection state [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Casi di maniglia in cui TargetRect è specificato in decimali tra zero e uno [#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.es:
Configuración agregada para el tiempo de alarma [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Manejo de mensajes fijos de múltiples partes para el cruce de líneas/detección de campos, etc [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
Guardar opcionalmente XML/imágenes " enviar eventos mediante el envío a otros adaptadores [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20) " [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hiksuvisionalsu.
Estado de conexión [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
Handle cases where TargetRect is specified in decimals between cero & one [#24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24).
0.1.0.pl:
Dodawana konfiguracja alarmowa (#16)(https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBrokervision-alarmserver/issues/16).
Fixed multipart message handling for line crossing/field detection, etc. (https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hik-alarmserver/issues/18) (ang.).
Opcjonalnie zapisywane pliki XML/images & wysyłają do innych adapterów #20(https:/github.com/iobroker-community-ioBroker.hikvision-alarmser/issues/20) & #26(https:/github.com/ithub.comiobroker-community-alarmser/Broker-Brovisioner/Brovisionalker-arms/26.com.
Added info.connection state (#22)(https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBrokerhikvision-alarmserver/issues/22) (ang.).
Sprawy ręczne, w których TargetRect jest zastrzeżone w dziesiętnie między zerem a jedną #24(https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmser/issues/24)4.
0.1.0.uk:
Додано конфігурацію часу сигналізації [#16](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/16).
Фіксована багаточасткова обробка повідомлень для визначення лінії перетину / поля тощо [#18](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/18).
Необов'язково зберегти XML/images & відправити події, використовуючи sendTo в інші адаптери [#20](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/20) & [#26](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/26).
Додана інформація. Стан підключення [#22](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/22).
У випадках, коли TargetRect вказаний у десятках між нуль та одним [#24] (https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/24).
0.1.0.zh-cn:
增加警觉时间配置[第16号](http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/16).
(http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/18).
备选案文为其他适应者(第20号)(http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/20)和[#26](http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/io Broker.hikvision-alaserver/issues/26).
增编为:联系国[第22](http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/22).
在零至1个[第24](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/24)之间,目标Rect说明的中午餐情况.

0.0.7.en:
Add bind address option ([#9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9)).
Try to derive device names from net-tools. Optionally use channelName from devices ([#10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10)).
0.0.7.de:
Bind-Adresse hinzufügen #[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Versuchen Sie, Gerätenamen von Net-Tools abzuleiten. Verwenden Sie optional ChannelName von Geräten #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.ru:
Добавить опцию бид адреса #[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Попробуйте вывести названия устройств из net-tools. Дополнительно используйте channelName от устройств #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.pt:
Adicionar opção de endereço de ligação #[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Tente derivar nomes de dispositivos de ferramentas líquidas. Use opcionalmente o canalNome de dispositivos #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.nl:
Add bindadres optie 9) (https)com/iobroker-community-apters/ioBroker.
Probeer de namen van nettolen te ontleiden. Optioneel gebruik je kanaalname van apparatuur.
0.0.7.fr:
Ajouter l ' option d ' adresse bind #[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Essayez de tirer les noms de périphériques des outils nets. Utiliser en option le canalNom des dispositifs #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.it:
#[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Cerca di derivare i nomi dei dispositivi da net-tools. Facoltativamente utilizzare il canaleName dai dispositivi #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.es:
Add bind address option #[9](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
Trate de derivar nombres de dispositivos de herramientas netas. Uso opcional del canalName desde dispositivos #[10](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.pl:
Add wiąże opcję adresową #9 (https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBrokervision-alarmserver/issues/9) (ang.).
Try to derive the names of devices from net-tools. Opcjonalnie używa kanałuName z urządzeń #10 (https:/github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBrokervision-alarmserver/issues/10).
0.0.7.uk:
Додайте варіант зв'язування #[9] (https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/9).
Спробуйте імена деревих пристроїв від net-tools. Необов'язково використовуйте каналName з пристроїв #[10] (https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/products/10).
0.0.7.zh-cn:
增加本可选择的行动[9](http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/9).
取自净工具的装置名称。 选择地使用“装置”第[10]号(http://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.hikvision-alarmserver/issues/10).

0.0.5.nl: Laat kolonels vallen van apparaat ID's.

desc.en: An adapter to receive alarms/events send from Hikvision cameras.
desc.de: Ein Adapter zum Empfangen von Alarmen/Ereignissen, die von Hikvision-Kameras gesendet werden.
desc.ru: Адаптер для приема сигналов тревоги/событий, отправляемых с камер Hikvision.
desc.pt: Um adaptador para receber alarmes/eventos enviados de câmeras Hikvision.
desc.nl: Een adapter om alarmen/gebeurtenissen van Hikvision camera's te ontvangen.
desc.fr: Un adaptateur pour recevoir les alarmes/événements envoyés par les caméras Hikvision.
desc.it: Un adattatore per ricevere allarmi/eventi inviati dalle telecamere Hikvision.
desc.es: Un adaptador para recibir alarmas/eventos enviados desde cámaras Hikvision.
desc.pl: Adapter do odbierania alarmów/zdarzeń wysyłanych z kamer Hikvision.
desc.zh-cn: 接收从海康威视摄像机发送的警报/事件的适配器。
